attributes.action: remove and abolish ALL UNELECTED PEERS from the House of Lords, and replace them with a wholly and publically ELECTED house of local and regional representatives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that the House of Lords would be more useful as a house of wholly and publically elected representatives, working with and for communities at local and regional levels.

Having publically elected local/regional representatives could reduce voter “apathy” and mistrust of politicians by encouraging people to choose their own representatives, voice their opinions and become more proactive in local politics.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
